summary: Dr. Surendra Kumar's medical license was immediately suspended for unprofessional conduct, which included making inappropriate sexual comments, erratic behavior, and harassment, and for inappropriately prescribing Controlled Dangerous Substances (CDS) and other medications to employees and non-patients without proper evaluation or documentation. As part of the disciplinary action, he is ordered to enroll in the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program (MPRP) and cannot petition to lift the suspension until MPRP advocates his safety to practice.
